title: Reward Icons
body: Will there be any chance to get both icons? I want the graves icon from Act 1 but I already picked TF cause I didn't know what I was doing lol.

replies.body: We made this a deliberate choice for players. You are only able to pick one icon per act. So choose wisely! :)

I've had an unfortunate setback in regards to playing, so I would like to know, do I need to rush matches in order to finish the challenge BEFORE a certain timeframe?
And if so, what is the timeframe, as I do know how how many acts there are, and if I have to finish them before the next one begin, or before the end of this event.
it's just before the end of the Event.
